name: Trigger Visual Effect
description: Trigger a dramatic visual effect in the user interface for celebrations, alerts, or fun interactions. Effects include confetti, balloons, fireworks, sparkles, red alerts, rainbows, snow, stars, hearts, and 2030-themed celebrations.

effect.description: The visual effect to trigger. Options: confetti (celebratory burst), balloons (floating balloons), fireworks (explosive display), sparkles (magical particles), red-alert (warning animation), rainbow (colorful gradient), snow (falling snow), stars (twinkling stars), hearts (love animation), 2030 (futuristic celebration)

duration.description: Duration in milliseconds for the effect animation. Default: 3000

intensity.description: Effect intensity level. Low = subtle, Medium = standard, High = dramatic. Default: medium

message.description: Optional message to display with the effect (e.g., 'Congratulations!' or 'Alert: System warning')

position.description: Where the effect should appear. Default: full-screen

examples.description: Celebrate a successful task completion with confetti
Alert user to a critical error
